title: Reset Password
content:
Dear {{name}},

You have requested to have your password reset for your account at {{appName}}

Your new password for login is {{password}}

If you didn't make this request, you can ignore this email.

The {{appName}} Support Team

title: New Account
content:
Dear {{name}},

Welcome to {{appName}}

Please click the link below to confirm your account creation:

{{url}}



The {{appName}} Support Team

title: New Email
content: Dear {{customer_data.firstname}} {{customer_data.lastname}}, the email address associated to your Magoware account has been changed to {{req.body.email}}
